title: One Must Be Worthy of Counsel

text_block_list.text: A day off. It was nice out, so I was taking a stroll through town――

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Boss! What a coincidence, seeing you here!
Are you out on the town today?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Copy! I'm doing the rounds, patrolling the town for danger!
Seeing her work so hard for the sake of the town, even on her days off, had me impressed. It made me want to help her out a little.
choice_data_list: Well, I'm here anyway. Can I join you?
Well, I'm here anyway. Can I join you?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Woah! To think you would be willing to accompany me...!
Yes, it would be a great comfort!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: The streets may seem safe at first glance, but danger could be lurking around any corner. We need to keep close watch, or... Hm!?

text_block_list.name: Lost Kid
text_block_list.text: Sniff... Mommy... Where's mommy...?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
You there! Are you lost!?
State your name! Can you describe your parents!?

text_block_list.name: Lost Kid
text_block_list.text:
Whuh!? I-I'm scared...!
Mommyy.....!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
M-my apologies!
...I didn't mean to scare you...!
choice_data_list: You're alright~ Don't be scared, OK~?

text_block_list.name: Lost Kid
text_block_list.text:
Wahh... Sniff...
R-really...?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Yes! It's just as Boss said!
We're here to take you into custody――！

text_block_list.name: Lost Kid
text_block_list.text: WAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...The neighborhood police should be able to handle things, thanks to you managing to calm that child down...
――Hm!?

text_block_list.name: Old Woman
text_block_list.text:
Heave ho, heave ho...
...Phew.
Age sure did a number on my back...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, kind senior citizen! I can handle this!
Give your things to me, now!

text_block_list.name: Old Woman
text_block_list.text: HUHHH!?? W-what's your problem!? You trying to swindle me!?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
S-swindle you!? Of course not!
I am not a criminal, I assure you!!

text_block_list.name: Old Woman
text_block_list.text:
Your angry mug doesn't scare me one bit!
Somebodyyyy, HEEEELLP!!!!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
We managed to clear things up, thanks to you...
........Sigh.

Fenomeno slumped her shoulders, dejected.
As her trainer, it was up to me to step up and reassure her.
choice_data_list: Feeling tired? I'll get us some coffee.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Oh! I can go buy――
choice_data_list: It's OK, I got it. You take a break.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Umm... Right.
Thank you for your concern...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
(Scaring a child, getting mistaken for a thug...
I've been nothing but a hindrance today...)

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: (...No, not only today.)

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: (I had to depend on Boss with the garden incident, and forced them to go beyond a trainer's duties.)

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
(I'm still every bit as worthless as I was before.
Even now, I'm making Boss worry about me.)

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: (...As I am... Am I worthy of Boss's guidance...?)
Ngh...! Argh...!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ――! Over there...!!
I went back over, canned coffee in hand, but...

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Over here!
I followed her voice, and found her looking after a man who'd keeled over.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
It seems his chronic illness is flaring up.
He tried to call an ambulance, but...

text_block_list.name: Man
text_block_list.text:
They're not coming... They're just not coming...
I've waited and waited, but... Rrgh...!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Apparently, there's a major traffic jam in the area.
So the ambulance hasn't been able to make it...

text_block_list.name: Man
text_block_list.text:
The hospital on this note... Take me... Please...
Ngh...!? Grahh.... Ngh...!!
The man held a doctor's note with instructions to take him to the listed hospital in case of an emergency.
I looked up the hospital's location on my phone, but... It was still too far. Even if we called a taxi, the traffic jam meant they might not get here on time...
After a second of thinking, I sent Fenomeno the route to the hospital on LANE.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
choice_data_list: I need you to get him to that hospital.

text_block_list.text: Having watched her train, day by day, I knew what she was capable of. With her strength and stamina, she could get him there in time for sure.

And above all else, she had a powerful force of will. The kind that let her dedicate herself to justice.
If anyone could do it, it was her.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Hang on tight, sir!
――RAAAAAAAAGH!!
I stayed behind to explain to the ambulance crew that Fenomeno was taking the man to the hospital, following the doctor's note. And then――

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ――!! Boss!!

It seems they just barely managed to treat him in time.
They said he avoided the worst case scenario.
text_block_list.name: Fenomeno

text_block_list.text: Leaving the rest in the hospital's hands, the two of us started making our way back. Today was a rough day for sure, but there was something cathartic about a job well done.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...I managed to save that man, thanks to you.
It was your training that gave me the strength to carry him.
choice_data_list: I knew you could do it.
I knew you could do it.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Haha...
Much obliged.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...To be frank, I was wavering.
Doubting if I was worthy of your guidance.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
But... not anymore.
If I'm unworthy, then all I need to do is dedicate myself to becoming worthy.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
I truly do want to follow you.
So that you may lead me to my ideal justice.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
I know I'm still immature.
I have no shortage of flaws, and I may cause you no end of trouble.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: But even so, would you allow me to continue to stand by your side?

Standing before me was a girl with an unwavering faith in justice. I couldn't help but be drawn to her because of it.
So I knew exactly how I would answer.
choice_data_list: Of course. I'm your "Boss", aren't I?
Of course. I'm your "Boss", aren't I?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ――Thank you so much!
